result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Carolyn D Hines

records.addlTxt:
[ma] Case called at 8:31am 
Defendant Carolyn D Hines not in court.  Attorney Amber Rumpf appears on behalf of Attorney Jeffrey Jacob De La Rosa in court for Carolyn D Hines.  Attorney Brookellen Teuber in court for State of Wisconsin. 

ADA Teuber requests $400 cash bond be forfeit. 
Atty Rumpf has no additional information. 

The Court forfeits bond, judgment to enter. 
recess: 8:32am
Returnable to any Jefferson County magistrate.

[MK] case called at 11:33am 
Defendant Carolyn D Hines not in court.  Attorney Jeffrey De La Rosa in court. DA Monica Hall in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
This case is scheduled for Status Conference.  Attorney De La Rosa does not have information regarding the non-appearance.
The Court issues a Bench Warrant-Body Only returnable to any Jefferson County magistrate.
The Court finds the Bond to be in default. 
recess 11:35am

NEXT:  schedule Bail Forfeiture Hearing.
Bond was modified down to $400 - per 7/5/22 court order.  22C 014173

Pre-trial conference on August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on September 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

[Court Reporter: Lisa Kwasigroch]
[ma] Case called briefly at 9:13am; again at 9:21am 
Defendant Carolyn D Hines in court with Attorney Jeffrey Jacob De La Rosa.   ADA Krysta Parson appears for the State of Wisconsin.

Detective Jacob Reitz -sworn & testifies
--direct examination by ADA Parson 
--cross examination by Attorney De La Rosa 

The Court finds probable cause that Ms. Hines committed a felony. The Court binds her over for Trial.

Arraignment:
--service of Information admitted, reading waived
--the charge and maximum penalties are recited
--plea of "not guilty" entered
--in response to the Court's inquiry, both counsel indicate that they are not requesting speedy trial.

Atty De La Rosa orally moves for bond modification; gives basis.
--ADA Parson objects

The Court modifies bond to $400 cash; $200 to be returned to poster.  
recess: 9:36am 

NEXT:  (1) Pretrial Conference on 8/17/22 at 10:00am  (2) Status Conference on 9/1/22 at 11am

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on July 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Conditions of this bond include:
--submit to the booking process prior to being released from the Jefferson County Jail, if not already completed

[ml] Case called at 1:25PM
[All Appearances via Zoom]
Court Reporter Erin Kempfer remotely.
Defendant Carolyn D Hines appears via Zoom from the Jefferson County Jail, in custody, along with Public Defender Jeffrey De La Rosa (the PD will appoint counsel).  Public Service Special Prosecutor Melanie Flint appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
The Court finds that the video-connection is sight and sound sufficient. 

The Defendant provides an updated address for the Defendant: 1832 Loomis St, Rockford, Il 61101.

The Defendant verifies that the date of birth listed on the Criminal Complaint is correct. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charges and maximum penalties are recited.
Preliminary Hearing time limit is waived by both parties.

The Court requires a $600.00 Cash Bond with conditions:
--submit to the booking process prior to being released from the Jefferson County Jail, if not already completed

recess 1:35PM

NEXT: Preliminary Hearing on 07/05 at 8:30AM with in person appearances

ADDRESS INFO for Carolyn D Hines
Current: 1832 Loomis St, Rockford, IL 61101 United States  (Effective: 05-27-2022)
